description: Discover this impeccably maintained 1/2 duplex that offers the space, comfort & feel of a detached home. Thoughtfully designed the spacious layout is perfect for families & those who love to entertain.The main level boasts an open-concept kitchen, eating area & family room-creating a warm, welcoming hub for daily living.You'll also find a separate formal living/dining area, ideal for hosting + a dedicated home office.Upstairs features four generously sized bedrooms, providing ample space for family & guests. The primary suite includes a walk-in closet & ensuite. Bonus-single car garage plus 1 open parking space. Conveniently located just minutes from schools, parks, T&T, Ikea & HWY 1 accessâ€”this home truly has it all, don't miss out! Showings by appointment only.
